name: Google Developers
description: Google Developers is your source for announcements, protips from product experts, and the resources to support your development efforts.

name: Elastic
description: Elastic is the company behind the Elastic Stack — that's Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash. From stock quotes to Twitter streams, Apache logs to WordPress blogs, we help people explore and analyze their data differently using the power of search.

name: JetBrains
description: JetBrains is a leading creator of development tools which have been loved by professionals for over 15 years. JetBrain's mission is to make professional software development a more productive and enjoyable experience.

name: Manning
description: Manning is an independent publisher of computer books for software developers, engineers, architects, system administrators, managers and all who are professionally involved with the computer business. The books we publish cover a huge range of topics that the modern developer needs; from languages and frameworks, to best practices for team leaders.

name: PyImageSearch
description: Dedicated to helping developers, students, and researchers become awesome at Deep Learning, OpenCV, and Python.

name: Shroff Publishers & Distributors
description: Shroff Publishers and Distributors Private Limited has a tie up to reprint and distribute a few US publishers like O'Reilly Media Inc., Maker Media Inc.,SitePoint Pty. Ltd, Mike Murach & Associates, Rampant TechPress, Pragmatic Bookshelf, IBM Redbooks, MC Press, Discovery Press, etc.

name: Droidcon India
description: The droidcon HQ team and Chennai-based organizer team are excited to bring droidcon back to India after a two-year hiatus.

name: Uvsity
description: Uvisity is an educational social network.
